options.name: DEATH
choices: They go unconcious and can sleep to wake up
They are dead and must be revived to wake as their dream selves

options.name: CHANNELS
options.desc: **How many channels are made when a player registers?***
choices: Two, their terminal and perstercord channel
Zero, make the current channel their terminal

options.name: TUTORIAL
options.desc: **Does every player start with the tutorial enabled?**

options.name: RETAIN
options.desc: **Do creatures hold on to leftover stamina from their last turn by default?**

options.name: FOG
options.desc: **Is there a Fog of War on player's planets?**

options.name: IMMORTAL
options.desc: **How do godtier players revive if killed?**
choices: They come back to life after 5 minutes
A DM/Author is summoned to judge their fate
